name: ext_R4_Contract_te_securityLabel
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Contract.term.securityLabel for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.term.securityLabel from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Security labels that protect the handling of information about the term and its elements, which may be specifically identified..
element.comment: `Contract.term.securityLabel` maps to R3 `Contract.term.securityLabel`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
